original_title: Mercedes-Benz aftersales experience offered by DIMO
original_body_lines: DIMO, The HOME for Mercedes-Benz, hosted an exclusive evening – The Mercedes-Benz StarDiscovery+ to uncover the mysteries behind the iconic three-pointed ‘Star’ for their Mercedes-Benz clients recently.

The StarDiscovery+, led by Mercedes-Benz AG Trained Technical Experts, took attendees on a journey of Model-Specific Technical Advice. Expert tips and insights into the art of servicing and maintaining these precious ‘Stars’ left guests enchanted, immersing them in the world of the Mercedes-Benz Aftersales Experience offered by DIMO, The HOME for Mercedes-Benz.
